title: You're Invited: National Announcement for Federal Hall
desc:
First Capital. First Congress. First President. It all happened at the site of Federal Hall. 
 Located on Wall Street in the heart of New York City's Financial District, Federal Hall National Memorial is a symbol of the successful establishment of democracy and capitalism in America.? An icon of Lower Manhattan,?the structure that adorns the site today is a Greek Revival masterpiece conceived by Ithiel Town and A.J. Davis that was completed in 1842. 
 Please join the National Park Service, the National Parks of New York Harbor Conservancy, the National Trust for Historic Preservation, and American Express on Wednesday, December 2, 2015, as we announce a new partnership to celebrate this important place that matters. Confirmed speakers for the announcement include: 
 Joshua Laird , Commissioner, National Parks of New York Harbor 
 Oskar Eustis , Artistic Director, The Public Theater 
 Stephanie K. Meeks , President, National Trust for Historic Preservation 
 Timothy J. McClimon , President, American Express Foundation 
 Marie Salerno , President, National Parks of New York Harbor Conservancy 
 An RSVP for this free event is requested. On social media? Use #FederalHall and #ThisPlaceMatters and tag @SavingPlaces to share with friends and followers that you will be joining us. 
 ? ???????  Oskar Eustis , Artistic Director, The Public Theater
